name: Birdie Bird GB Style (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

UPDATED Relax Mode Again V2.0: Fix a Sprite Collision that i introduced with the Last Update and also added Even More Zen (Animated Sprite's).

Battle Mode: Be the Bird and fly over the Gameboy Style landscape while Shooting at the Baddies.

Or

Relax Mode: Be the Bird and sit back and watch the landscape go by, or fly around, you cannot die, no baddies just a calm and relaxing experience.

1 Player Game, Easy Battle Mode or Very Easy!! Experimental Relaxing Mode.

Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software.
